---
title: theta:theta.CallSmartContract - Theta Network
description: Example code for the theta:theta.CallSmartContract json-rpc method. Ð¡omplete guide on how to use theta:theta.CallSmartContract json-rpc in GetBlock.io Web3 documentation.
---

### Parameters


`sctx_bytes` - string

the signed transaction bytes.

### Request

``` java
curl --location --request POST 'https://theta.getblock.io/mainnet/' 
--header 'x-api-key: YOUR-API-KEY' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' 
--data-raw '{"jsonrpc": "2.0",
"method": "theta.CallSmartContract",
"params": {"sctx_bytes": ""},
"id": "getblock.io"}'
```

###  Response

``` java
{
    "error": null,
    "id": "getblock.io",
    "jsonrpc": "2.0"
}
```
